job_history.work_description: Prepare financial statements, maintain accurate records in a database, generate reports and present data. Enter revenue and expense transactions and prepare expense reports. Prepare and file financial statements such as balance sheets and income statements. Complete purchase orders and customer invoices. Calculate sales taxes and make bank deposits.
Duties included: sandwich making, order organization, order preparation and order delivery. Maintained food handler certification.

Managed a 350-client route. Responsibilities included analyzing lawn, developing treatment programs to address each lawn's specific problems, monitoring lawn status, evaluating its progress during every visit and adjusting custom treatment program.
Entered customer orders, prepared pizza dough and toppings, made pizzas and delivered customer orders safely within company time requirements.

skills.name: Financial Statement Preparation
skills.explanation: Prepared financial statements such as balance sheets and income statements, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Data Entry
skills.explanation: Entered revenue and expense transactions, customer orders, and maintained accurate records in a database, indicating a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Report Generation and Presentation
skills.explanation: Generated reports and presented data, showing some practical experience.

skills.name: Customer Service
skills.explanation: Handled customer orders, prepared pizzas, and delivered customer orders safely, indicating a solid working proficiency in customer service.

skills.name: Time Management
skills.explanation: Delivered customer orders within company time requirements, showing some practical experience in time management.

skills.name: Analytical Skills
skills.explanation: Analyzed lawn conditions, developed treatment programs, and monitored lawn status, showing some practical experience in analytical skills.

skills.name: Problem-Solving
skills.explanation: Adjusted custom treatment programs based on lawn progress, indicating some practical experience in problem-solving.

skills.name: Food Preparation
skills.explanation: Prepared pizzas, made sandwiches, and handled food preparation tasks, showing some practical experience.

skills.name: Food Safety
skills.explanation: Maintained food handler certification, indicating basic familiarity with food safety.
